full_text: Shirley Skipper-Scott Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646-836-(b)(6) Black Berry: 646-423-(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov >>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 9:42 AM >>> Thanks. (b)(5) what does "Psychology Observation" status mean? J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521-(b)(6) >>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 9:39 AM >>> Hello, Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney. I will provide you with information concerning the medical assessment, once I receive it. Thanks. Shirley Skipper-Scott Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646-836-(b)(6) Black Berry: 646-423-(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov >>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 8:45 AM >>> Shirley - Please provide me with a daily update on this inmate, including his status and any changes/activities I should be aware of. Thanks! J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521-(b)(6) Page 1536 DOJ-OGR-00023618
